entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adorner layer does not display anything for MAUI+WinUI #8096
  • MSB4018 The "GenerateShims" task failed unexpectedly on MauiCheck #8094
  • The "Xamarin.Android.Support.BuildTasks.VerifyVersionsTask" #8093
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.0.3 Preview 1.0 change color icons in Maui to black. #8092
  • .net MAUI debugging -> GetCurrentDirectory() points to C:\windows\system32 #8091
  • .net MAUI, Cannot create a log file in AppData/Roaming or AppData/Local #8090
  • Directory.CreateDirectory does not work in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #8089
  • Platform Independent Solution for MAUI WebView Control #8085
  • Frame Property "IsVisible" not being properly displayed when changing Boolean value to true in backend C# when initialized False in XAML #8084
  • Backgroundcolor of Radiobutton is wrong in .net MAUI. #8083
  • Maui - No Capabilities Shown in Windows Manifest #8082
  • Maui Sample with errors NU1012 and NETSDK1139 #8081
  • Cannot create MAUI App Shell project #8080
  • MAUI Referencing .NET Standard 2.0 NUGet package throws System.BadImageFormatException when starting application #8079
  • When editing a MAUI csproj, VS auto inserts `AndroidResource` of the item that was changed #8078
  • MAUI "type or namespace name 'Application' could not be found" VS2022 Community 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8077
  • .NET MAUI Templates not showing up - Windows 11, Visual Studio 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8076
  • [Maui]Not able to Debug MAUI apps when using Net6.0 Tizen #8075
  • MAUI.NET App: Infinite assertion failure in UIKit.UIApplication due to absolete code usage. (NSInternalInconsistencyException) #8074
  • Issue with OnPlatform in Maui #8073
  • Target platform identifier android not recognized (6.0.400-preview.22301.10) #8072
  • Android Button on template currently not resizing when text changes #8071
    6.0-sr2
  • Entry decoration on Android not correct. #8067
  • Pin target MAUI workload by using rollback file #8066
  • Pair to Mac fails on VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 / 6.0.400 #8065
  • PushModalAsync on Android not working in latest Visual Studio Update #8062
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #8050
  • Space in path causes ClassParse to fail #8049
  • XamlC should issue a warning when bindable property is marked as obsolete #8048
  • Pointer pressed not received in panel when using scroll view in windows #8046
  • IsVisible doesn't work anymore #8044
    6.0-sr2
  • Dynamically changing view in ContentView content shows empty page (Android) #8040
  • [Android] 1. ToPlatformException: CollectionViewHandler incompatible 2. Button width incorrect。 #8039
  • ANDROID Shell.Current.GoToAsync doesn't work if Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated" #8038
  • Image with different format not working In IOS #8036
  • Debug start fails for Tizen App #8035
  • MAUI Dependencies cause issues when updating the MAUI workload with 3rd party dependencies #8032
  • Suggest: WidthRequest value can set to percentage, Can set only one border type in xaml #8031
  • MAUI Blazor Apps do not allow iframe videos to run full screen #8030

Closed

  • Updating WinUI properties via resources does not take effect #7820
    6.0-sr2
  • Entry background not accurate when changed with Triggers #5084
    6.0-sr2
  • Calling ClearValue if a color is null on WinUI is incorrect behavior #4356
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to un-set values on Windows #7803
    6.0-sr2
  • Android app icons with just a single image (no ForegroundFile) do not render #7987
    6.0-sr2
  • Android app icons do not respect foreground scale and tint #7986
    6.0-sr2
  • SVG Icon display and scaling issues, platform dependent. #7629
    6.0-sr2
  • [Android] MauiIcon BaseSize and ForegroundScale doesn't work #7305
    6.0-sr2
  • Resizetizer does not respect splash screen alias #7990
    6.0-sr2
  • [Windows] MauiIcon Color and TintColor doesn't work in taskbar and is inconsistent elsewhere #7207
    6.0-sr2
  • SplashScreen does not regenerate after changing properties (Color/ForegroundScale) #7988
    6.0-sr2
  • No names for culture region #7948
  • No documentation for Maui-specific tags introduced in .csproj projects #7525
  • Unable to block popups in BlazorWebView #7930
    .NET 7
  • Slider Disabled style is inconsistent #7882
  • New MAUI project with la fair number of packages build for windows, but exits with "java.exe exited with code 1" #4895
    6.0-servicing
  • Border set in maui styles.xaml is ignored in a xaml page #7744
  • [Bug] Some input files use or override a deprecated API, Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details #3245
    6.0-servicing
  • [Bug] [Mac] Grouped collections views does not scroll vertically #2850
    6.0-servicing
  • Add Maui default global usings in SDK targets #1564
    6.0.300
  • OnPlatform Behaviors does not work #8042
  • XAML designer/previewer #6782
  • Text drawing has lot of bugs in android #8043
  • iOS Hot Restart feature not working after updating to VS2022 17.3 Preview 2 #8029
  • Build not working in MAUI Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 [32307.209.main] #5108
    6.0-servicing
  • ClockPage Refresh of current time clock is stop after some seconds or time #7978
  • “.NET MAUI gallery” not announced as heading. #6594
    6.0-servicing
  • Assinging SingleProject tag the value of false in csproj file does not have any effect #4029
  • Android in-app purchases: port Xamarin.Android.Google.BillingClient to Maui #3899
  • Build Windows target using `dotnet build` instead of `msbuild.exe` #3926
  • Add full LocalSettings implementation from UWP #3892
  • Add support for appsettings.json #3446
    Future
  • Failed to install maui-windows workload on ARM64 #3764
    .NET 7
  • Access controls inside DataTemplate #3675
  • How can i make MAUI Blazor Application rounded and WindowStyle None #3371
  • its Impossible to do more than one MAUI-Library Project into a Solution in VS2022 RC !! #3424
  • [Bug] <MauiImage> won't accept PNG file for Android AppIcon #2972
  • Xamarin Auth and .NET Maui with Facebook deprecation of embedded browsers #2791
  • [Feature ]Tag property Item on Buttons and other elements #2818
  • [Enhancement] x:Double's OnIdiom #2830
  • Check Xaml capabilities in maui #2148
  • Porting Blazor WASM to Blazor MAUI #2861
    Future
  • [Bug] Label text does not rendered correctly #1975
  • [Bug] TapGestures tapped event not trigged #1977
  • Error while trying to run WeatherTwentyOne on My Android phone and PC SDKs problem I guess #1981
  • Maps should be independent from the System Maps #8037
  • Pairing to Mac not working in Visual Studio 2022 1.17.3 Preview 2 #8026
  • Visual studio 2022 - 17.2.4 maui:/ #8027
  • Object.GetType returns Null #7401
  • string assignment is everytime null #7688
  • [IOS bug] string.Replace always returns null #7555
  • Android does not detect physical devices, emulators do not deploy #7477
  • rzc rewritecss exited with code -2147450730. #7955

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the correct define (NET6_0_OR_GREATER) #8086
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, 6.0-sr2
  • Update Development Notes to the latest #8070
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove the extra lines in the error message for better viewing #8069
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • Make implicit package refs privateassets=all #8064
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • Automatically add MauiIcon to AndroidManifest.xml #8063
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 7
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8060
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8057
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8056
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.39 to 1.0.1245.22 #8055
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 #8054
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8053
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8052
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix crash using ContentViews inside CollectionView #8051
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, fatal
  • [core] use Lazy<T> for MauiContext properties #8033
    area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Multiple Fixes for Resizetizer (esp. Android App Icons) #8020
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix Titlebar visibility when backbutton is present #7932
    6.0-sr2
  • [android] reduce JNI calls during layout measurement #8034
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [C] fix BP declarations for Border #8047
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️

Updated

  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Backport main to net7.0 #7908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [essentials] use Lazy<T> for Android application-wide values #7996
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0-servicing
  • [android] avoid View.Context where unecessary #8001
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fixup Flyout Template Parts #8022
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0-sr2
  • Add the three-parameter overload #6790
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Set the correct font using IsPassword property on Entry #8015
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Hook up horizontal scroll events on Android #8021
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
